description: Motherwell seal a season-long loan deal for 20-year-old Arsenal striker Mika Bierith.
title: Mika Bierith: Motherwell secure loan for young Arsenal striker
title_page: Mika Bierith: Motherwell secure loan for young Arsenal striker - BBC Sport
maintext: Our coverage of Motherwell is bigger and better than ever before - here's everything you need to know to make sure you never miss a moment
